title: $500 off first full month's Rent
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
If you’ve been searching for apartments in Katy TX, let us help you find your home at Vineyards.
Our beautifully landscaped community of one, two, and three-bedroom homes comes with designer amenities and convenient resident services chosen just for you.
Schedule a tour to discover your ideal floor plan and join us today.
Indulge in modern design and open-concept floor plans fully equipped with premium finishes and the interior amenities you’ve been looking for.
Soaring ceilings and large windows attract beautiful, natural light, and high-end amenities make your day-to-day tasks that much easier.
Get ready to cook delicious meals in your gourmet-style kitchen and curl up to read your favorite book in your cozy living room.
A stroll around the community will reveal exciting amenities exclusively for you.
Whether you’re taking a dip in the pool or catching up on some work in the resident library and lounge, there’s always something new to do and see.
Our convenient location puts you just west of Houston, with plenty of local attractions including dining, shopping, and entertainment right here in Katy.
Explore local parks and restaurants or go for a quick drive into the city for a metropolitan experience.
Whatever you’re craving, you’re sure to find it here in our community of Katy apartments.
We implement a 2-pet limit per apartment home.
Please contact the office for pet fee and pet rent amounts required for each pet.

Not approved but not limited to, Pit Bull Terriers, Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, German Shepherd, Presa Canarios, Chow Chow, Doberman Pinschers, Akitas, Wolf hybrids, Mastiffs, Cane Corsos, Great Danes, Alaskan Malamutes, Siberian Huskies.
Including any mix of the breeds listed above.
